How do you think we'll reach World Peace?\n

When we can stop being nonchalant in regarding one another, so as to say,
stop making mere hiccups/speed bumps of emotions exponentially birthing nice and nuance all
out of one other being and the stuff inside of them. to what end should we make light of the
mental labor another gives us, putting forth the products if their lifelong consumption, coming
into being before us? this work is more valuable than work that is done by hands or on paper,
for it has the power to evoke perceptible changes within a person/people.\n
